lead_paragraph: A Little Warm pulled away to win the $500,000 Jim Dandy Stakes for 3-year-olds at Saratoga, while Proviso took the $500,000 Diana on the turf for fillies and mares in a thrilling finish.
snippet: A Little Warm pulled away to win the $500,000 Jim Dandy Stakes for 3-year-olds at Saratoga, while Proviso took the $500,000 Diana on the turf for fillies and mares in a thrilling finish.

headline.main: Landis Rides In Catskillsa Little Warm Wins Jim Dandy
headline.print_headline: A Little Warm Wins Jim Dandy
